Spec_Tools documentation
========================

**Spec_Tools** is a Python package for analyzing and visualization of spectroscopic data. It provides tools for handling data obtained from
IR, NMR, UV-VIS, and other spectroscopic techniques. The package includes functions for data processing, plotting, baseline fitting, peak deconvolution, and more.
